fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Implementarea directivelor europene (EPBD, RES, EED) prin organizarea de manifestări tehnico-ştiinţifice, precum conferințe, simpozioane, mese rotunde de specialitate și asigurarea accesului la aceste manifestări cu precădere a membrilor asociației.
organisation_name: ROMANIAN ASSOCIATION OF BUILDING SERVICES ENGINEERS (AIIR)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
